note.p: Career: Assistant, Materia Medica department, University of Edinburgh; Assistant Physician, Royal Infirmary, Edinburgh (1869-1874); Examiner in Materia Medica to the University of Edinburgh; Professor of Materia Medica, University of Edinburgh (1877-1917); Physician, Royal Infirmary, Edinburgh (1878-1917); Chairman, Indian Plague Commission (1898)
Memberships: FRSE; FRCPE; Therapeutical Society of Paris (Corresponding)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series B 1921 vol 92 pp xi-xvii, plate, signed by J T C
